title: The Secret Diary of Adrian Mole
brief_description: Based on the best-selling book by Sue Townsend, “The Secret Diary of Adrian Mole”, aged 13 3/4 years, is a funny, bitter-sweet comedy that will bring back those painful but amusing memories of growing up. Stars Julie Walters. Rated: PG
